    • addMenuItem

      public void addMenuItem(MenuItem menuItem)
      Description copied from interface: Repository
      Adds a menu item to the DB. The required MenuItem must have a list of ingredients ready to go as well as their IDs. You may omit the ID field in MenuItem, but not everywhere else
      Specified by:
      addMenuItem in interface Repository
      Parameters:
      menuItem - Complete menu item object

    • deleteMenuItem

      public void deleteMenuItem(int id)
      Description copied from interface: Repository
      Deletes a menu item. This method also deletes entries in tables dependent to menu items. This does not delete orders that contain the item, but it can cause these orders to have "ghost items"
      Specified by:
      deleteMenuItem in interface Repository
      Parameters:
      id - Complete menu item object

    • getMenuItem

      public MenuItem getMenuItem(int id)
      Description copied from interface: Repository
      Returns a menu item based on its id
      Specified by:
      getMenuItem in interface Repository
      Parameters:
      id - - The ID of the requested item
      Returns:
      - Filled out MenuItem object
